trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ontario
There were no other sightings in Ontario on or around March 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsBright light similar to that of a television in the dark. Shooting across the sky while my husband was grilling outside. Saw this bright light looked up in awe stood their for a moment and then ran in the house. Came back out and their was a streak (trail) in the sky where the it looks like the sky split between the flying object. Tried taking pictures but it was too dark, could not get a good image.
